rationale: AlertDialog uses React Portal for proper z-index stacking but lacks focus management. When a modal opens, focus doesn't move into the dialog, and pressing Tab can focus elements behind the modal overlay. This violates WCAG 2.4.3 Focus Order.
problemSolved: AlertDialog (lines 667-729) renders a modal with backdrop but: 1) No role="dialog" on content container. 2) No aria-modal="true". 3) No focus trap - Tab key can focus elements behind modal. 4) No auto-focus to first focusable element. 5) Escape key doesn't close the dialog. 6) Focus not returned to trigger element on close.
